articles.title: Bob Marley grandson dead: Reggae star Jo Mersa Marley was 31 - New York Post
articles.description: The Jamaican American reggae artist was allegedly found unresponsive in a vehicle.
articles.content:
Joseph “Jo Mersa” Marley, son of musician Stephen Marley and the grandson of reggae legend Bob Marley, has reportedly died. He was 31.
The Jamaican American reggae artist was allegedly found unrespo… [+3096 chars]

articles.title: Bob Marley's grandson Joseph Mersa Marley is found dead - Daily Mail
articles.description: Jamaican American reggae artist Joseph Mersa Marley has been found dead at the age of 31. The musician was found unresponsive in a vehicle in the US on Tuesday.
articles.content:
Jamaican-American reggae artist Joseph Mersa Marley is dead at the age of 31.

articles.title: FBI warns about 'pig butchering' crypto scam sweeping America - Newshub
articles.description: The FBI says America has a "pig butchering" problem.
articles.content:
The term pig butchering refers to an unsuspecting victim -- the "pig" -- being tricked by scammers into forking over money for a promised high rate of return.
